bug.short_desc: webapp/code needs cleanup/refactoring, custom repo cmd support

long_desc.thetext:
Created attachment 4517 minor enhancements for developers (compile.jsp ant target)
Webapp needs refactoring + code cleanups code needs cleanup + custom repo cmd support
Suggested patches (not necessarily standalone):
0) development.patch minor: ant compile.jsp target, debugging support 1) eclipse-support.patch minor: basic settings to support eclipse IDE as well incl. code style suggestion 2) logging.patch minor: generics, get rid off annoying useless messages/stack traces 3) code-cleanup.patch normal: Lang Usage (type safety) / "String" Usage (Enums) / misc code "cleanup" 4) code-cleanup-new.patch normal: new classes introduced wrt. 3) 5) code-change.patch normal: new class members (methods/fields), code/dom structure changes + code cleanup 6) repoCmdFix.patch major: Custom repo cmd support, tabsize support, zap cache support, list repos support 7) webapp.patch major: Webapp refactored 8) webapp-new.patch major: new files introduced wrt. 7) 9) webapp-imgs.tar.gz major: refactored images. d.gif and g.gif are just adjusted to a common size. servedby.png got replaced by web/offwhite/img/servedby.png (transparent background). combined.png imgs can actually be reproduced using the tools/img_combine.sh, however, probably not everybody has ImageMagick installed on his machine ...
Created attachment 4520 code cleanup, lang usage
Created attachment 4521 new classes wrt. code cleanup, lang use
Created attachment 4523 custom repo cmd, zap cache, list repo, tabsize support
Created attachment 4525 new files wrt. webapp refactoring
Created attachment 4526 webapp image changes, additions

Jens to push the patches under your name, I will need an OCA # you can get one by mailing: http://hub.opensolaris.org/bin/view/Main/oracle_contributor_agreement they usually get back within 2-3 days
(I didn't check the database yet, so if you have an OCA/SCA # already, just paste it here)
thank you! L

OS0482
BTW: these patches include the changes wrt. https://defect.opensolaris.org/bz/show_bug.cgi?id=18103 as well ;-)

(In reply to comment #11) > OS0482 > > BTW: these patches include the changes wrt. > https://defect.opensolaris.org/bz/show_bug.cgi?id=18103 as well ;-)
D'oh! I knew I saw your OCA somewhere ;)
yes ... above patch, I'd like to push it first - I was confused about the message size limit, but then I was ok with it and forgot to push ...
Trond, Knut - please wait with pushing this, I(or you can if you want and will be faster than me) should push above first - besides the message limit hardcode (which isn't really a problem, since it only applies to stderr output we previously threw away) I didn't have any problems with the patch and it should have been in repo for a long time (my problem, seems I totally missed it within all the changes that happened to me in past months)
-- L

(In reply to comment #12) > (In reply to comment #11) > > OS0482 > > > > BTW: these patches include the changes wrt. > > https://defect.opensolaris.org/bz/show_bug.cgi?id=18103 as well ;-) > > D'oh! > I knew I saw your OCA somewhere ;) > > yes ... above patch, I'd like to push it first - I was confused about the > message size limit, but then I was ok with it and forgot to push ... > > Trond, Knut - please wait with pushing this, I(or you can if you want and will > be faster than me) should push above first - besides the message limit hardcode > (which isn't really a problem, since it only applies to stderr output we > previously threw away) I didn't have any problems with the patch and it should > have been in repo for a long time (my problem, seems I totally missed it within > all the changes that happened to me in past months) > > -- > L
commited now, so whoever will review/integrate src/org/opensolaris/opengrok/util/Executor.java beware of changeset: 1175:c7b300ca1ebd ;)

(In reply to comment #14) > Reviewed and pushed patch 1-3
I think you meant 0-2... :)
I reviewed patch 3. It mostly looks fine, but it would have been nice to get rid of the tabs in the patch. Also, the build fails when I apply it:
-do-compile: [mkdir] Created dir: /code/opengrok/trunk/build/empty [javac] Compiling 204 source files to /code/opengrok/trunk/build/classes [javac] /code/opengrok/trunk/src/org/opensolaris/opengrok/analysis/AnalyzerGuru.java:227: cannot find symbol [javac] symbol : method path2uid(java.lang.String,java.lang.String) [javac] location: class org.opensolaris.opengrok.web.Util [javac] doc.add(new Field("u", Util.path2uid(path, date), [javac] ^ [javac] 1 error
In Ctags.java there's a change that seems to be a partial workaround for bug #17849. Was that change intentional?
Yes, it slipped through: It is part of the code changes patch (5).
Ctags.java: No workaround for #17849 - just a normal addition motivated by this bug.
*** Bug 18755 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

attachment.desc: minor enhancements for developers (compile.jsp ant target)
new classes wrt. code cleanup, lang use
custom repo cmd, zap cache, list repo, tabsize support
